subject: fix(debug): add 'graph' to DebugSource type
body:
GraphCanvas.tsx calls debugLog('graph', ...) but 'graph' was missing
from the DebugSource union type, causing TS2345. Added 'graph' to the
union and the corresponding SOURCE_COLORS entry in DebugPill.

Tags: typescript, debug, graph
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 3
Impact: infrastructure
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: type-safety
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_016hJEozrRjNVMc9RS5pnq8b
title: add 'graph' to DebugSource type
